page.title: 05The Railway Station
page.content: Wem Station is close to the town centre.It is on the line from Crewe to Shrewsbury. We spent a whole day at the station making a survey of it. There were 25 trains that day.The total number of people who got on the trains was 157 and 135 of them were going towards Shewsbury.The total number of people getting off was 180 of whom 148 came from Shrewsbury. The average lateness of the trains was 6 minutes 12 seconds.We found a pattern in the way people used the line. Many more people travelled to Shrewsbury rather than Crewe.Also most people went to Shrewsbury in the morning between 8 a.m. and midday. In the afternoon not many people went to Shrewsbury or Crewe,but a lot of people returned from Shrewsbury. Those going early or late were workers while the shoppers travelled in between.
